title: Smålands Fotbollförbund
text:
The Smålands Fotbollförbund "(Småland Football Association)" is one of the 24 district organisations of the <a href="Swedish%20Football%20Association">Swedish Football Association</a>. It administers lower tier <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> in the historical provinces of <a href="Sm%C3%A5land">Småland</a> and <a href="%C3%96land">Öland</a>.
Background.
Smålands Fotbollförbund, commonly referred to as Smålands FF, is the governing body for football in the historical province of Småland, which roughly corresponds with <a href="J%C3%B6nk%C3%B6ping%20County">Jönköping County</a>, <a href="Kalmar%20County">Kalmar County</a> and <a href="Kronoberg%20County">Kronoberg County</a>. The Association currently has 343 member clubs. Based in <a href="J%C3%B6nk%C3%B6ping">Jönköping</a>, the Association's Chairman is Håkan Danielsson.
Affiliated Members.
The following clubs are affiliated to the Smålands FF:
League Competitions.
Smålands FF run the following League Competitions:
Men's Football.
<a href="Swedish%20football%20Division%204">Division 4</a> - six sections
<a href="Swedish%20football%20Division%205">Division 5</a> - six sections
<a href="Swedish%20football%20Division%206">Division 6</a> - eleven sections
Women's Football.
<a href="Swedish%20Women%27s%20Football%20Division%203">Division 3</a> - three sections
<a href="Swedish%20Women%27s%20Football%20Division%204">Division 4</a> - five sections
<a href="Swedish%20Women%27s%20Football%20Division%205">Division 5</a> - eight sections
